channel.title: How I got scammed In Runescape
channel.description:
Well Here's A Weird Story How I Got scammed in runescape.....
Well I was just having a normal day on runescape then this guy was running around the grand exchange saying 70M mix drop or something like that (He showed everyone the 70M, 66M cash and 4M items) and there where lots of people following him he took everyone somewhere Close to the west bank in varrock.. Then He asked a Question. "Who notes your fish or something like that ) and someone said stiles which was correct he apparently gave him 20M, I think it was his brother or close friend so he could make us believe him. Then he made a bidding contest i bid the most 3.4M all my money the next thing you know He's gone...... oh well Someone said when they get members he'll sell his bcp and give me 3.5M because I'm the only one who got scammed everyone else got there money back.... oh well lesson learned. I never lost the bidding he just scammed me he just logged off... I'm stupid btw i Know that.(The Prize was 20M , thats what he said so....)

item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Over 9000 scammers came back with free trade.

HERP DERP
